/sigh this torrent is real, It's a real image of the 2 dvd's however it is not cracked so you can not play it. If you however want to install it ahead of time so that your ready when the crack comes out you can:
1) Mount DVD2 with Daemon tools, open it and drag and drop Data.zip to an empty folder on your desktop named battlefield 3.
2)Mount DVD1 with Daemon tools.
3)Right click on Data.zip that you just moved into your battlefield 3 folder and click extract here.
4)you will get an error click close to continue with extracting.
5)It will ask you for the 2nd part of the file to continue extracting.
5)Mount DVD2 again, direct your extracting file to the data.zip location on DVD2 and wait (skipping error)
Install completed.

Hello , 

offline activation:
1)launch bf3.exe – it says that release date – 27 october
2)in task manager find where is this file (C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\mtka_tmp)
3)open lang_dfa.ini and change to
# GENERAL SETTINGS
ONLINE_MODE=false
MANUAL_MODE=true
……….
# RELEASE CONTROL SETTINGS
RC_MODE=false
save lang_dfa.ini and make it read only
4)open bf3.exe and enter cd-key (for example 3FQQ-NDVL-QPTB-FPFW-QYYT)
now it requires .lic file (license file )
This will get you past the release check part but still we need a crack.

ok got a good and short way to install it..

- install winzip (only winzip will work :( )

I figured it out and I'm now playing. Problem is we tend to assume the installation procedure is typical of all other games. It is not. There is no setup wizard that would let us know that the game is being installed. So, I made this idiot guide (after scouring all the comments) to clarify how to install this game properly.

BATTLEFIELD 3 INSTALLATION FOR IDIOTS:

Note: This is not your usual installation unlike most games. There is no actual setup process (after the usual mounting and extracting process we are used to) where the game is installed to windows.

The readme that comes with both torrents are incomplete. Below is their instruction with my own procedure in all caps.

Installing Battlefield 3 (Battlefield.3.2011.CLONEDVD-P2P).

1) MOUNT DVD 2 ..u will find Data.zip
	MOUNT BOTH IN SEPARATE DRIVES TO AVOID CONFUSION AND HUSTLE.IN MY CASE 	DISK 1 WAS MOUNTED AS DRIVE W:, & DISK 2 AS DRIVE X:

2) Copy that Data.zip to somewhere on ur HDD.
	AFTER MOUNTING BOTH DISK, GO TO DISK 2, OPEN IT AND YOU SHOULD SEE .RAR FILE NAMED "DATA.ZIP". COPY THIS FILE AND PASTE IT IN A (TEMPORARY) 	FOLDER 	WITH A HUGE SPACE (25G). THIS WILL ACTUALLY BECOME THE GAME DIRECTORY WHEN EVERYTHING IS COMPLETE.

3) Now Mount DVD 1.
	YOU ARE ALREADY DONE WITH THIS BY NOW IF YOU FOLLOWED MY WAY.

4) Now Go back to Data.zip file that u copied earlier and click Extract.
	THIS DATA.ZIP FILE IS THE ONE IN YOUR FOLDER AND NOT THE ONE IN DISK 2	MOUNTED IN YOUR VIRTUAL DRIVE.

5) It will ask you for data.z01 file.
6) Now This data.z01 file is on DVD1 that u mounted..so point it there..and your extraction starts. 
	HE MEANS DISK 1 YOU MOUNTED IN ANOTHER VIRTUAL DRIVE.

7) U will get an error that file is corrupt but just close it and let it continue extracting. 
	SELF EXPLANATORY

8) After some time it will ask you to point out to The Data.zip file that you first copied....so point it to that file. 
	NOTE ITS THE DATA.ZIP FILE YOU PASTED EARLIER IN YOUR FOLDER, NOT THE 	ONE IN THE VIRTUAL DRIVE.

9) U will get another error saying corrupt file..and ignore it.
10) Thtas it..all ur files will be extracted..Very Happy.
11) Now Download missing files Provided in this Thrad And paste Them.
	NOW GO TO THE OTHER TORRENT FILE, Battlefield 3 Fixx.

Trust me this method works. What I wrote is merely to elaborate & make more understandable a method that works for so many people already. But just in case another method by bwidger is worth exploring-

bwidger's method....

1. You do NOT need to burn .iso files. Instead, extract both DVD 1&2 .iso files to their own separate folders (i.e. "extract to DVD1\).

2. After extracted, go to DVD 2 folder then Game folder. Copy all .zip files.

3. After copying, go to Game folder inside DVD 1 folder and paste it in DVD 1's Game Folder. You should now have gamefiles 1-58 inside DVD 1's Game folder.

4. When all gamesfiles are in DVD 1's Game folder (1-58), double click "GameFiles.part01" to start the extract process. All 58 parts will now extract.

5. When all gameparts have extracted go to DVD 2 folder then to Crack folder and copy contents.

6. After copying crack folder contents go back to DVD 1 folder, Game folder, and then paste to apply cracked contents. Make sure you copy over existing .exe file.

7. Enjoy the game! ;)
